name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A woman was hanging upside down on the windowsill in Vanke Jinyu Central Building 4, Foshan City, Guangdong Province, for unknown reasons

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
"Twitter crashed" became a hot search on Weibo today
Some netizens said that they remembered that Twitter had been crashing for many years and could not be opened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The State Administration of Radio, Film and Television held a meeting to study and deploy how to strengthen the management of short videos and prevent minors from becoming addicted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
An article published on March 2 in China Youth Daily suggested guiding college graduates to join the ranks of high-quality farmers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On February 27, Hohhot issued a tender notice for the "Hohhot Permanent Cabin Hospital Construction Project (Construction Section)", which attracted heated discussions among netizens.
The platform shows that this tender has 868 beds, and the construction content is isolation rooms and security rooms, among which isolation rooms include isolation areas, nurse stations, etc.
In this regard, a staff member of the Hohhot Municipal Health Commission told reporters that this is a normal tender notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Today, Xiamen Civil Air Defense Navigation Platform is officially launched
From March, log in to the "iXiamen" APP and search for "Civil Air Defense Navigation" to enter the Xiamen Civil Air Defense Navigation Platform.
The platform includes four major functions: civil air defense map, early warning notification, on-site direct reporting and civil air defense education. It can not only match and navigate the nearest air defense shelter for citizens, but also use satellite images to view the construction conditions and population distribution around the shelter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many netizens think that as long as the account says what I want to hear, it doesn’t matter whether the account is real or fake.
I think this is a very wrong view.
The behavior of these accounts is a kind of theft. The identity is stolen, and the opinions and content are also stolen. Especially when Twitter has announced that creators will receive benefits, netizens’ connivance will hurt the impersonated person and every content creator.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, I want to say that truly good ideas can become popular without the help of others. If you really want to eat this bowl of rice, and really think that the content you output is valuable, you might as well stand up and express it yourself, and don’t hide behind the fake halo of celebrity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @WesleyHawk6 I think normal people should be able to tell the difference between a prank and an impersonation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tuo Qingming, a member of the National People's Congress and the principal of No. 2 Middle School in Yucheng District, Ya'an, Sichuan Province, said in an interview that he suggested that the score of foreign language in the college entrance examination be reduced to 100 points, because the practical value of foreign languages for many people is limited.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! Xinhua News Agency issued an article
The Chinese Embassy in the United States reminds Chinese citizens to be cautious when traveling to East Palestine, Ohio, and surrounding areas in the near future!
Earlier, on the evening of February 3, 2023, a freight train carrying dangerous chemicals such as vinyl chloride derailed near East Palestine.
